title: Web Development Services ~ Daniel Vargas
heading: Web Development Services
caption: Custom digital solutions to boost your business. From fast landing pages to complex and scalable web applications.

web_development.title: Website Development
web_development.caption: I transform your ideas into clean, efficient code. I build fast, SEO-optimized websites that help your brand stand out in the digital market.

web_design.title: Responsive Web Design
web_design.caption: Visual experiences that engage on any screen. I design intuitive interfaces (UI/UX) ensuring smooth navigation on mobile, tablets, and desktop.

maintenance.title: Web Maintenance
maintenance.caption: Your business never stops. I offer security updates, backups, and technical optimization to keep your site running perfectly 24/7.

google_maps.title: Google Business Profile
google_maps.caption: Make your business stand out when customers search in your area. I create, verify, and optimize your listing on Google Maps and Search to attract local traffic and improve your reputation.
